sentences.en: Anytime I see a skunk I just run away.
sentences.cn: 我只要一看到臭鼬就会逃之夭夭.

sentences.en: Does the young prince play with the wittle bunny and the wittle skunk?
sentences.cn: 小王子就和小兔子和小臭鼬玩吖?

sentences.en: I'd get you underarm injections? to stop you stinking like a skunk!
sentences.cn: 我会帮你做腋下注射 ─ ─让你不再像只臭鼬一样难闻!

sentences.en: It is the Kookaburra ( Porcupine ) and Skunk Kingdoms that greet you today.
sentences.cn: 今天是笑翠鸟 ( 豪猪 ) 和臭鼬王国向你们问候.

sentences.en: It's not certain whether the advent of skunk has increased these reactions.
sentences.cn: 是否毒瘾的来临加剧了这些反应,目前还不能确定.

sentences.en: Let every man skin his own skunk.
Must you be such a skunk in front of my friends?
sentences.cn: 你非得在我朋友面前显得这么讨厌 吗 ?

sentences.en: PUPPY : That old dirty Dawson , the yellow - livered old skunk.
sentences.cn: 那个可恶的道森, 那个卑鄙的大混蛋.

sentences.en: Sam Pierce was a good man, and you're a skunk.
sentences.cn: 山姆·皮尔斯是个好人, 而你是个混蛋.

sentences.en: Skunk : Right, me neither. My spine's like an accordion.
sentences.cn: 对, 我也是. 我的脊骨变成手风琴了.

sentences.en: That was a rotten thing to do, you skunk!
sentences.cn: 那种事做得太缺德了, 你这卑鄙的家伙!

sentences.en: The skunk gives off an unpleasant smell when attacked.
sentences.cn: 受到攻击时臭鼬会发出一种难闻的气味.

sentences.en: What do you get when you cross a bear with a skunk?
sentences.cn: 熊和臭釉杂交会变成什么东西?

sentences.en: What? You rat! You skunk! We had a deal!
sentences.cn: 什么? 你这只沟鼠! 骗子! 我们有协议的!

words.tran_cn: [脊椎]臭鼬；臭鼬毛皮；讨厌鬼；卑鄙的人

trans.tran_cn: 臭鼬，臭鼬毛皮，<口>卑鄙的人，可恶的人
trans.tran_en: a small black and white North American animal that produces a strong unpleasant smell if it is attacked or afraid
